attributes.action: instruct the appropriate authority to construct such high bridges over roads that nothing can be thrown over them
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I occasionally read of stupid yobs thinking it very funny(!) to throw things, such as bricks etc., over bridges onto roads; these mindless acts of vandalism have been know to cause the DEATHS, or SERIOUS INJURIES, of their innocent victims.  The obvious long-term solution is some sort of education about the danger of this, together with an understanding of why people do it and doing something about that, but in the meantime my suggestion will at least protect innocent road users.
